sentences.english: Executor, Zeratul shall find us passage to the warp gate.
sentences.chinese: 执行长，泽拉图会杀出一条通往传送门的血路。

sentences.english: Pang is the chief executive of PEMGroup.
sentences.chinese: 彭日成是保盛丰的首席执行长。

sentences.english: Michale D. West is a president and CEO of Advanced Cell Technology, a privately held biotechnology company in Worcester.
sentences.chinese: 威斯特是先进科技公司的总裁兼执行长。

sentences.english: The board's vote to hire Ms. Dean as CEO was unanimous .
sentences.chinese: 董事会无异议通过聘请狄恩女士担任执行长。

sentences.english: Mr. Cai will succeed Zha Xiangyang as CEO of the joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 蔡金勇将接任查向阳担任高盛高华的首席执行长。

sentences.english: Anne Lauvergeon, chief executive of Areva, ranked 3rd.
sentences.chinese: 排在第三的则是法国阿海珐电力集团执行长罗维津。

sentences.english: Two CEO biogs stand out from the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 有两家公司执行长的个人小传出类拔萃。

sentences.english: Its chief executive, Qin Dazhong, was also previously at Li Ning.
sentences.chinese: 公司首席执行长秦大中之前也曾在李宁公司供职。
